title: nick权限怎么删除
author: ArnoCc
txt_content: RT我给玩家删除了essentials.nick这条权限 可是他们还是能用 急

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
ArnoCc 发表于 2014-8-19 14:00
/mangdelp builder essentials.nick 然后没有用
用这个试试:
mangaddp builder -essentials.nick

replies.author: ArnoCc
replies.txt_content:
jiuerd 发表于 2014-8-19 13:58
你怎么删除的?
/mangdelp builder essentials.nick 然后没有用

replies.author: ArnoCc
replies.txt_content:
jiuerd 发表于 2014-8-19 14:03
用这个试试:
mangaddp builder -essentials.nick
然后我的nick权限怎么也没了 {:10_493:}怎么恢复自己的

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
ArnoCc 发表于 2014-8-19 14:08
然后我的nick权限怎么也没了 怎么恢复自己的
mangaddp 组 essentials.nick

replies.author: ArnoCc
replies.txt_content:
jiuerd 发表于 2014-8-19 14:10
mangaddp 组 essentials.nick
弄好了 谢谢你呢
